body: Think long and hard about whether you actually need to provide the functions math implements. You almost certainly don't; you probably just need to provide your extras. That said, if you do need to provide a more_math module that implements all the standard math functions too, the easiest way to do this is to do a from math import *. This will bring every function the math module defines into your module. This is considered very bad practice, because it pollutes the namespace of your module and can make it difficult to tell what is actually being used. However, in this case, pollution of your module's namespace is exactly what you want.
title: Inheriting math methods into a class with only static methods
